actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate States and units of local government for the loss of real property tax revenues due to the tax exempt status of certain real property owned or occupied by foreign countries and international organizations.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate States and units of local government for the loss of real property tax revenues due to the tax-exempt status of real property owned or occupied by foreign countries and international organizations within that State or unit of local government.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to compensate States and units of local government for the loss of real property tax revenues due to the tax exempt status of certain real property owned or occupied by foreign countries and international organizations.
